Posts.EditableText: I installed an older version of quest 3.53, and it installed fine, but, when I tried to run it, it said there was a missing .dll file. "MSVBVM50.DLL" to be exact. Does anyone know a way to fix the problem... other then downloading the newer version?
Posts.HTML: I installed an older version of quest 3.53, and it installed fine, but, when I tried to run it, it said there was a missing .dll file. "MSVBVM50.DLL" to be exact. Does anyone know a way to fix the problem... other then downloading the newer version?

Posts.EditableText: The Quest 3.53 setup doesn't include this required file - but you can download it from: http://download.microsoft.com/download/ ... vbvm50.exe
Posts.HTML: The Quest 3.53 setup doesn't include this required file - but you can download it from: http://download.microsoft.com/download/ ... vbvm50.exe

Posts.EditableText: Thanks Alex, but, now I get a runtime "6" error when I try to open an existing game asl
Posts.HTML: Thanks Alex, but, now I get a runtime "6" error when I try to open an existing game asl

Posts.EditableText:
What game? Is it one from textadventures.co.uk (if so, which one? Is it designed for v3.x?)

If not do you get the same error in v4?

Error 6 is an "overflow" error which either means something is too big, or something caused it to get stuck in an infinite loop.
